title: Limit handoffs
detail: Tasks with repeated handoffs are delaying cycle time. Cap handoffs to 1 and keep ownership stable until QA.

title: Break down long stages
detail: Split work into smaller steps with intermediate check-ins every 24-36 hours to prevent stalls.

title: Add AI copilots
detail: Use AI to draft briefs, summaries, and outlines; enforce human review before sending externally.
